controllers

Class EnterDiagnoseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.EnterDiagnoseController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class EnterDiagnoseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this controller to enter the diagnose of a patient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnterDiagnoseController(LoginController loginController, ConsultPatientFileController consultPatientFileController)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiagnoseIN enterDiagnose(java.lang.String complaints, java.lang.String diagnose)
      Registers a new diagnose in the patient file that the user who created this controller has currently opened.

      Registers a new diagnose in the patient file that is currently opened and marks it for second opinion right after createion.
      java.util.Collection<DoctorIN> getAllDoctors() 

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnterDiagnoseController

        @PUBLICAPI
public EnterDiagnoseController(LoginController loginController,
                                 ConsultPatientFileController consultPatientFileController)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        loginController - The login controller of the user that wants to enter a diagnose for a patient file.
        consultPatientFileController - The consult patient file controller that the user who wants to enter a new diagnose has created already.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the user to whom the given login controller belongs to is not a doctor or if the controller is invalid in any other way.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        exceptions.InvalidConsultPatientFileController
        See Also:
        HospitalController, NeedsLoginAndPatientFileController

    • Method Detail

      • enterDiagnose

        @PUBLICAPI
public DiagnoseIN enterDiagnose(java.lang.String complaints,
                                 java.lang.String diagnose)
        Registers a new diagnose in the patient file that the user who created this controller has currently opened. Use this method if you do not require a second opinion for the created diagnose.
        Parameters:
        complaints - The complaints of the patient who has been diagnosed.
        diagnose - The diagnose you're trying to register.
        Returns:
        The diagnose that was created.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidDiagnoseException - If the given diagnose was invalid.
        exceptions.InvalidComplaintsException - If the given complaints are invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • enterDiagnoseWithSecondOpinion

        @PUBLICAPI
public DiagnoseIN enterDiagnoseWithSecondOpinion(java.lang.String diagnose,
                                                  java.lang.String complaints,
                                                  DoctorIN secondOpinionDoctor)
        Registers a new diagnose in the patient file that is currently opened and marks it for second opinion right after createion.
        Parameters:
        diagnose - The diagnose that was made by the doctor.
        complaints - The complaints the patient had when walking in.
        secondOpinionDoctor - The doctor that should give his/her second opinion on the diagnose you're trying to register.
        Returns:
        The created diagnose.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidDiagnoseException - If the given diagnose is invalid.
        exceptions.InvalidDoctorException - If the doctor you require second opinion from is invalid.
        exceptions.InvalidComplaintsException - If the given complaints are invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • getAllDoctors

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<DoctorIN> getAllDoctors()
        Returns:
        All doctors working in this hospital.
